# scale_nic (Resource)

Scale NIC resource to manage VM NICs



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `type` (String) NIC type. Can be: `VIRTIO`, `INTEL_E1000`, `RTL8139`
- `vlan` (Number) NIC VLAN.
- `vm_uuid` (String) VM UUID.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) NIC identifier
